SEARCH
Package lt.techin.library.pt

Interface BookCatalog

public interface BookCatalog
This interface represents the catalog of books in a library. It provides methods to manage and query books in the catalog.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    addBook(Book book)
    Adds a book to the catalog.

    Calculates the average price of all books in the catalog.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      void addBook(Book book)
      Adds a book to the catalog. If a book with the same ISBN is already present, the book is not added again.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book to be added to the catalog; must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book is null or has invalid fields (like null or empty ISBN).

    • getTotalNumberOfBooks

      int getTotalNumberOfBooks()
      Returns the total number of books in the catalog.
      Returns:
      The total number of unique books in the catalog.

    • printBookTitles

      void printBookTitles()
      Prints the titles of all books in the catalog.

    • printTitlesOfBooksPublishedAfter

      void printTitlesOfBooksPublishedAfter(int year)
      Prints the titles of all books published after the specified year.
      Parameters:
      year - The year after which books should be considered.

    • getBookByIsbn

      Book getBookByIsbn(String isbn)
      Retrieves a book by its ISBN from the catalog.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Book with the specified ISBN.
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - if no book with the specified ISBN is found.

    • searchBooksByAuthor

      List<Book> searchBooksByAuthor(String authorName)
      Searches for books by the name of the author.
      Parameters:
      authorName - The full name of the author whose books are to be searched.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects by the specified author. If no books are found, returns an empty list.

    • isBookInCatalog

      boolean isBookInCatalog(String isbn)
      Checks if a book with the specified ISBN is present in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book to check.
      Returns:
      true if the book is in the catalog, false otherwise.

    • isBookAvailable

      boolean isBookAvailable(String isbn)
      Checks if a book with the specified ISBN is available in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      isbn - The ISBN of the book whose availability is to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the book is available, false otherwise.

    • calculateTotalPrice

      double calculateTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all books in the catalog.
      Returns:
      The total price of all books as a double.

    • calculateAveragePrice

      double calculateAveragePrice()
      Calculates the average price of all books in the catalog.
      Returns:
      The average price of all books. If there are no books, returns 0.0.

    • getSortedBooks

      List<Book> getSortedBooks()
      Retrieves all books in the catalog, sorted by publication year in ascending order.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects sorted by publication year.

    • searchBooksByTitleContaining

      List<Book> searchBooksByTitleContaining(String text)
      Searches for all books whose titles contain the specified text, case-insensitively.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to search for within the book titles. The search is case-insensitive.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects whose titles contain the specified text. If no books match or the text is empty, returns an empty list.

    • findNewestBookByPublisher

      Book findNewestBookByPublisher(String publisher)
      Finds the newest book by the specified publisher.
      Parameters:
      publisher - The publisher whose newest book is to be found.
      Returns:
      The newest Book published by the specified publisher.
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - if no books by the specified publisher are found.

    • filterBooks

      List<Book> filterBooks(Predicate<Book> criteria)
      Filters books in the catalog based on the provided criteria.
      Parameters:
      criteria - A Predicate<Book> representing the filter criteria.
      Returns:
      A list of Book objects that match the filter criteria. If no books match, returns an empty list.

    • groupBooksByPublisher

      Map<String,List<Book>> groupBooksByPublisher()
      Groups books in the catalog by their publisher.
      Returns:
      A Map where each key is a publisher name and the corresponding value is a list of Book objects published by that publisher.
